entity.name: StellarSand
entity.description:
An open-source developer dedicated to creating tools and resources that empower internet users to take control of their privacy and security online.
Through thoughtful design and community-driven development, I aim to make privacy tools accessible and effective for everyone.

projects.name: Privacy Settings
projects.description: Guide to privacy settings for most major software and services.

channels.description: Donate via LiberaPay to support the continued maintenance and development of this project.
Donate via PayPal to support the continued maintenance and development of this project.

plans.name: Cosmic Contribution
plans.description: Contribute any amount as a token of appreciation for the project.

plans.name: Orbit of Giving
plans.description: Support the ongoing development of the project with a small monthly contribution.

plans.name: Comet Contribution
plans.description: A larger monthly contribution to sustain the development of the project.

plans.name: Nebula Boost
plans.description: Help propel the project forward with an annual contribution.

plans.name: Galactic Sustenance
plans.description: A higher annual contribution to accelerate the development of the project.

plans.name: Supernova Support
plans.description: Make a significant one-time contribution for a major impact on the project.
